message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product for $150. I think it's a great deal and would be very useful for you.
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate the product, but I am only able to pay up to $100 for it. I hope this revised offer is acceptable.
Thanks for the offer, Bob. I understand your position, but I'm looking for something closer to $130.  It's a high-quality product that I'm sure you'll find valuable.
Hello Alice, I've considered your latest offer and while I appreciate the product, I believe I can only afford to pay up to $120. I hope this aligns better with your expectations.
